titlestmt.titleproper: Guide to the Sheet music and Christmas book 2006.015
titlestmt.author: Nicholas Pavlik
titlestmt.sponsor: This collection was processed and described as part of the project, "Uncovering the Secrets of Brooklyn's 19th Century Past: Creation to Consolidation," funded by the Council on Library and Information Resources, with additional support from The Gladys Krieble Delmas Foundation.

profiledesc.creation: This finding aid was produced using ArchivesSpace on 2023-08-21 11:18:47 +0000.

did.abstract: Sheet music for the song "Moon over Brooklyn," dated 1946, and an illustrated Christmas story book titled To the Little Boys of Long Island, dated 1885. The book was printed by clothier O.S. Baldwin of Baldwin Building at the southwest corner of Smith and Fulton Streets in Brooklyn.

processinfo.head: Processing Information
processinfo.p: Minimally processed to the collection level.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Identification of item, date (if known); Sheet music and Christmas book, 2006.015, Box and Folder number; Brooklyn Historical Society.
